name: Apple Crumb Pie
ingredients: 5-7 c. peeled, sliced Granny Smith apples (4 apples=about 6 cups)
instructions: For filling, mix all ingredients and allow to sit while working on crust (the sugar will make the apples a little juicier).
For crust, mix flour, salt and sugar. Add butter and milk at once, stirring to combine. Pat mixture into 9" or 9.5" pie pan with heel of your hand. Add filling.
For topping, mix together all ingredients until crumbly; pat over apples.
